# GITS UI Component

## Installation

npm

```
npm i @gits-id/ui
```

yarn

```
yarn add @gits-id/ui
```

pnpm

```
pnpm i @gits-id/ui
```

## Usage

```ts
// file: main.ts

import GitsUI from '@gits-id/ui';

const app = createApp(App);

app.use(GitsUI);
```

## Documentation

View full documentation [here](https://gits-ui.web.app).
